Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm trying to create a mod part but I can't get the particle FX to work, nor when I compile the *.mu file the texture doesn't compile either.

I created a part that is basically a generator that removes fuel but doesn't give any output. Instead the generator has an animation that shows a white particle effect to simulate fuel being dumped out of the aircraft, or rocket or whatever.

Edited February 2, 2015 by Eskandare
What version of Unity are you using, and what can you see in the console in Unity when you hit write?
